subject: Re: [PATCH v2 0/2] x86/virt/tdx: Print TDX module version to dmesg

reviews.author: Vishal Verma (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Vishal Verma asked about the status of patch merging, specifically inquiring if Kiryl was planning to take it through x86/tdx and offering assistance.

reviews.author: Edgecombe, P
reviews.summary: The reviewer agrees to the patch and gives a Reviewed-by tag, but mentions that Xiaoyao is going to send a rebase after RC1.

reviews.author: Huang, Kai
reviews.summary: Reviewer Huang, Kai approved the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag.

reviews.author: Xiaoyao Li
reviews.summary: Reviewer Xiaoyao Li raised a minor concern about the order of field IDs in retrieving TDX module version, suggesting it's better to read major_version before minor_version for readability.

reviews.author: Binbin Wu
reviews.summary: Reviewer Binbin Wu approved the patch and provided a Reviewed-by tag, but pointed out a minor issue regarding the format of the printed message.

reviews.author: Kiryl Shutsemau
reviews.summary: Reviewer Kiryl Shutsemau requested that the patch be queued after -rc1 is tagged and gave a Reviewed-by tag.

reviews.author: Dave Hansen
reviews.summary: Dave Hansen reviewed patch v2 and suggested picking up other TDX-related patches

reviews.author: Xu Yilun
reviews.summary: The reviewer, Xu Yilun, raised a concern about the field IDs in the global metadata being human-readable hex magic numbers, which could lead to errors when copying from an Excel file to C code.

reviews.author: Tony Lindgren
reviews.summary: Tony Lindgren reviewed the patches and gave a positive review, indicating that the feature is great for debugging but didn't explicitly state if it's too late to implement.
